snippet.title: You are a Failed Murderer || Official Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3540870/You_are_a_Failed_Murderer/
There's a discord too :P https://discord.gg/6UWBvZSqrt
and my bsky: https://bsky.app/profile/rambiporkchop.bsky.social

You're someone with no memory
No Life; You are. Utterly Nothing.

Your life has had its borders realised and zoomed out.
You can see the edges of the screen.

It's rubber tubing has an incessant humming; it's head splitting.

You want to feel something, you _need_ to feel something.
You can only think of one way to do that.

You have one want. one need, to steal the life of someone, you haven't a care on how, but whatever you do.
Don't get caught.

Because... You wanna win this game right, to unplug lifes cables and wake up.

==GAMEPLAY FEATURES:==

-Such ground breaking features such as
- 5 Colours

- Multiple Choices

- ~~lazy~~ innovative art style.

-Welsh People.


CREDITS

A game by Rambi
Additional Programming from Stub
Trailer Music from Xaijeistou
Game Music and SFX from Traverser Irk

"7 Days" Soundtrack from "7 Days" from Daver the Dave

#indiegame #indiegamedev #rpgmaker #pixelart
